NFR_Sentença: In 100% of all cases, the system must have a mean response time of < 3s between event <user login> and event <first page view>. It is assumed that there are 50 concurrent users, during 120 seconds with 30-seconds of ramp-up.
The system must provide the capability for an administrator to enable and disable customer and user access.
The system must terminate a user session after a specified configurable period of inactivity by the user. This timeout should end the session and require authenticated logon to return to session.
Use Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) connections to encrypt information that travels between the device and the server.
When the password has changed, the system must automatically notify a customer via e-mail.
The system must verify newly registered users by sending them a verification token via e-mail before allowing them to log in.
Use Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) connections to encrypt information that travels between the device and the server.

Tarefa_mapeada: Persistir no banco os dados de acesso
Tarefa_original: Persistir no banco os dados de acesso

NFR_Sentença: If the server goes offline during data insertion, the system must display a loading for a maximum of 1 minute. If the backend comes back in the meantime, the data insertion operation must be performed automatically. Otherwise, if the server remains unresponsive after 1 minute, the system must notify the server problem for users.

The system must validate all data when entered based on the data validation rules. The system must use client-side data validation to improve performance for ordinary execution, i.e., no attacks. Client-side validation is faster since no request is sent to server.

Tarefa_mapeada: Fazer validação de dados no cliente
Tarefa_original: Fazer validação de dados no cliente

NFR_Sentença: The system must identify data that did not pass edit checks, and present such data to the customer/user for correction. Edit checking will continue until all data submitted is correct.

Tarefa_mapeada: Fazer validação de dados no cliente.
Tarefa_original: Fazer validação de dados no cliente.
NFR_Sentença: If the server goes offline during data insertion, the system must display a loading for a maximum of 1 minute. If the backend comes back in the meantime, the data insertion operation must be performed automatically. Otherwise, if the server remains unresponsive after 1 minute, the system must notify the server problem for users.

The system must validate all data when entered based on the data validation rules. The system must use client-side data validation to improve performance for ordinary execution, i.e., no attacks. Client-side validation is faster since no request is sent to server.
The system must capture the user identification and timestamp when information is created, or deleted.

If the server goes offline during data removal, the system must display a loading for a maximum of 1 minute. If the backend comes back in the meantime, the data removal operation must be performed automatically. Otherwise, if the server remains unresponsive after 1 minute, the system must notify the server problem for users.
The system must provide pagination when the number of returned search results exceeds the number of records to be displayed per page.
The system must provide the capability for users see just the information they have permission to access.

In 100% of all cases, the system must have a mean response time of <= 3s between event <search items> and event <display text information of listed items>. It is assumed that there are 200 concurrent users.
The system must provide the capability for users see just the information they have permission to access.
The system must dynamically display menus, pages, and functionality based on the security access of the user.
In 99% of all cases, the system must have a mean response time of <= 1s between event <view dashboard> and event <time to first byte>.

Tarefa_mapeada: Implementar metodo para exportação de relatório em PDF
Tarefa_original: Adicionar botão para exportação do relatório
NFR_Sentença: The system must be able to export a maximum of 10000 items at a time.

Tarefa_mapeada: Criar serviço para exportação de relatórios
Tarefa_original: Criar serviço para exportação de relatórios
NFR_Sentença: The system must capture the user identification and timestamp when information is exported.

Tarefa_original: Implementar método para exportação de relatório
